LanguageData.JRWCeratosaurus.label: Ceratosaurus
LanguageData.JRWCeratosaurus.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #02813-1884 [CERATOSAURUS NASICORNIS] CODENAME: CRIMSON >70
A small theropod boasting cranial horns and a blood red face. They are often found wandering the wilds in family packs.
